docs.snippet: Niese, who was in line to start on opening day, told Manager Terry Collins that his arm felt dead after throwing a recent live batting practice session....
docs.lead_paragraph: Niese, who was in line to start on opening day, told Manager Terry Collins that his arm felt dead after throwing a recent live batting practice session.
docs.abstract: Jon Niese, senior member of the New York Mets starting rotation and team's likely opening day starter, returns to New York from spring training in order to undergo an MRI on his left arm; pitcher missed seven weeks in previous season due to partly torn rotator cuff.

headline.main: Mets’ Jon Niese to Have M.R.I. Exam on Throwing Shoulder
headline.print_headline: Niese, His Pitching Arm Sore, Will Have M.R.I.

docs.snippet: Mike Trout, 22, the runner-up in American League Most Valuable Player voting the past two seasons, agreed to a one-year contract....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Trout, 22, the runner-up in American League Most Valuable Player voting the past two seasons, agreed to a one-year contract.
docs.abstract: MLB Roundup; outfielder Mike Trout signs $1 million, one-year contract with the Los Angeles Angels; other baseball news noted.

headline.main: Trout’s Deal Sets Record, but It’s for Only $1 Million
headline.print_headline: Trout’s Deal Sets Record, but It’s for Only $1 Million

docs.snippet: Mark Teixeira was 20 when he sustained an ankle injury similar to Derek Jeter’s. Teixeira said Jeter’s age might help him: he doesn’t have to worry about his career, only his final season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mark Teixeira was 20 when he sustained an ankle injury similar to Derek Jeter’s. Teixeira said Jeter’s age might help him: he doesn’t have to worry about his career, only his final season.
docs.abstract: Derek Jeter says he remains unconcerned about surgically repaired left ankle on the eve of his scheduled Grapefruit League debut; New York Yankees teammate Mark Teixeira notes that it took him over two years to recover from similar injury, but that Jeter has advantage of having to focus only on a final season.

headline.main: Where Derek Jeter Is, Mark Teixeira Once Was
headline.print_headline: Few Worries About Jeter’s Ankle as His Debut Nears

docs.snippet: “Redeployment,” a debut collection of short stories by an Iraq war veteran, Phil Klay, provides a visceral feeling for what it is like to be a soldier in a combat zone, and what it is like to return home....
docs.lead_paragraph: “Redeployment,” a debut collection of short stories by an Iraq war veteran, Phil Klay, provides a visceral feeling for what it is like to be a soldier in a combat zone, and what it is like to return home.
docs.abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews book Redeployment by Phil Klay.
